eventDecorators.name: Expelled
eventDecorators.description: when the auction of a token gets started. Emitted when a NFT is expelled from the stack.

eventDecorators.name: Nested
eventDecorators.description: when the auction of a token gets started. Emitted when a NFT begins staking.

eventDecorators.name: Unnested
eventDecorators.description: when the auction of a token gets started. Emitted when a NFT stops staking; either through standard means or by expulsion.

functionDecorators.name: stakingPeriod
functionDecorators.description: Returns the length of time, in seconds, that the NFT has nested. Staking is tied to a specific Big Cat & Little Cat, not to the owner, so it doesn't reset upon sale.

returnDecorators.name: staking
returnDecorators.description: Whether the NFT is currently staking. MAY be true with zero current staking if in the same block as nesting began.

returnDecorators.name: current
returnDecorators.description: Zero if not currently staking, otherwise the length of time since the most recent staking began.

returnDecorators.name: total
returnDecorators.description: Total period of time for which the NFT has staked across its life, including the current period.
